product_name: Kiehl's Since 1851Super Multi-Corrective Anti-Aging Face and Neck Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackThe Kiehl's Since 1851 Super Multi-Corrective Anti-Aging Face and Neck Cream is clinically proven to reduce wrinkles, even skin tone, and smooth skin texture.
details: DetailsBenefitsAddresses the most visible signs of aging on the face and neckFast-absorbing, lightweight creamFor all skin types, including sensitive skinKey IngredientsPhytoMimetic Vitamin A: helps visibly diminish wrinkles and renew skin's surface for more refined, smooth skinFragmented Hyaluronic Acid: acts like a sponge drawing moisture into skin's surface layers and expands as it absorbsChaga Mushroom: helps to even skin tone and boost radiance for a more refined, healthy-looking complexionResearch ResultsConsumers agreed that while using Kiehl's supercharged anti-aging cream:*93% saw reduced wrinkles91% saw more even skin tone93% said their skin looked & felt smoother94% saw lines on the neck reducedClinically proven to reduce wrinkles, even skin tone, and smooth skin's texture in just 4 weeks***Results based on a 12 week consumer test of 53 panelists in the US*Results based on a 12-week clinical study of 53 panelists in the USItem 2589390How To UseApply anti-aging cream evenly to cleansed skin and massage into face and neck area. Can be used both day and night.IngredientsAqua / Water, Glycerin, Dicaprylyl Ether, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter / Shea Butter, Hydroxypropyl Tetrahydropyrantriol, Isononyl Isononanoate, Propylene Glycol, Isopropyl Isostearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Behenyl Alcohol, Candelilla Cera / Candelilla Wax, Glyceryl Stearate, Stearic Acid, Hydroxyethylpiperazine Ethane Sulfonic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Carbomer, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Caprylyl Glycol, Peg-100 Stearate, Vigna Aconitifolia Seed Extract, Tocopherol, Xanthan Gum, Cetearyl Glucoside, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Disodium Edta, Pentylene Glycol, Jasminum Officinale Flower Extract / Jasmine Flower Extract, Myristic Acid, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Oil / Rosemary Leaf Oil, Adenosine, Inonotus Obliquus (Mushroom) Extract, Limonene, Linalool, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia Oil / Lavender Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply anti-aging cream evenly to cleansed skin and massage into face and neck area. Can be used both day and night.
ingredients: Jasminum Officinale Flower Extract / Jasmine Flower Extract
Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Oil / Rosemary Leaf Oil

reviews.headline: Moisturizing and smoothing
reviews.comments: I received a sample size of this product and my dry skin loveeessssss it. It immediately soaks it up and leaves it feeling so smooth and moisturized. If it wasnt so expensive I'd probably buy a full-size jar. Maybe some day!

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: Made my nose and cheeks have a burning sensation.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: Made my nose and cheeks have a burning sensation.

reviews.headline: I always have this on hand as my night treatment cream.
reviews.comments: This is my must have product.  Have used it a couple years now.  Non-reactive on my sensitive skin and feels wonderful on.  I believe it has made a difference in the texture of my skin and improved my neck wrinkles.

reviews.headline: Love It!
reviews.comments:
Finding the right skin care routine is never linear since it varies person per person. I have sensitive combination skin and I always struggled to find a product that didnt give me that greasy glow. 

This product is light yet hydrating enough that it doesnt require a lot of product. While the price tad is high, the big container last me 2-3 months depending on the weather. 

I would recommend you get a sampler size and try it out for 3 months because you wont see any instant results. After 6 months of using this product, it cleared my blackhead and slowly seeing results in other areas.

reviews.headline: A must have, quality ingredients for the skin on your face
reviews.comments: I have been using this multi corrective face cream since its arrived on the market, Im 52, it has been a game changer since i traded up from their daily moisturizer( in which i stared at 30. It doing what it needs to do, im not getting wrinkles or dry skin and i use it alone & under make up. I'm often asked if im 35 so i have to give some credit to kehls for it. I love the line, its fine quality and i will never waver!

reviews.headline: I'm one of the many who have been stung
reviews.comments: I bought this after many great reviews. I used it around 10 times and thought it was sunburn because I was red and sore. I switched to e45 then another brand and I was fine. I then tried it again after a couple of weeks and it stung my face again! I usually don't have sensitive skin and I'm gutted I spent so much and now can't use it

reviews.headline: Sits on skin; incompatible with other skincare or foundation
reviews.comments: Every single thing on my face 'balls up' when I use this moisturizer, including when I use it alone.  It does not absorb into my skin, but just sits on top. I've tried it in so many combinations and it's just incompatible with other skin care and foundations (I've tried several foundations -high end & low end- with same results).  I've also tried using it with serums, different primers, different sunscreens and alone with the same result. This is a hard pass for me.

reviews.headline: Haven't met a Kiehl's product I didn't love until now : (
reviews.comments: In my early adulthood i had terrible acne and skin probs. I tried proactive and everything at the drugstore, nothing worked. I found Kiehl's and my skin turned right around and I've never had a problem since. Im willing to pay for good skin care, but this price still hurts. My skin would feel waxy and really greasy for a long time which aggravated my pores, which in turn aggravated me. It doesnt feel moisturizing at all. I feel like i just wasted a lot of money. Kiehl's let me down for the first time : (

reviews.headline: Absolutely the only brand I use
reviews.comments: It goes on creamy and smoothly, and when I wake up in the morning my skin looks so good. Been using this and all Kiehls products for many years.

reviews.headline: Get this off my face!
reviews.comments: This was extremely irritating to my skin. It started to burn and little pimples developed. I had to wash it off immediately.  Fortunately, this was a sample product. I will never be purchasing this item!

reviews.headline: Burns!
reviews.comments: I got a free sample of this with purchase from Ulta and I greatly appreciate it but this really Burns my skin especially around my nose. I read reviews from other people that had the same irritations. I have no idea what is in this cream that burns and stings for hours.

reviews.headline: Burns
reviews.comments: Really sad about this cream because I thought it was gonna be the holy grail. But I have seen no difference in my skin and it burns when I apply it (I don't have sensitive skin at all)

reviews.headline: Sadly. Not for Me
reviews.comments: Really hoped to like this product. I have early 50s skin, a few wrinkles, lots of redness. Normal to dry usually. Within a week, I developed deep acne along cheeks, chin, and jawline. Thought it was just an adjustment. After four weeks, it's a total no go. Will be returning.

reviews.headline: Pricey!
reviews.comments: Pricey, but works well.

reviews.headline: Really Great Moisturizer
reviews.comments: I am familiar with Kiehl's products as I have used them before. But this item was new to me.  This moisturizer has a really nice texture and it absorbs nicely into the skin.  It makes your face feel smooth without feeling greasy and has a nice clean scent. I really like it.

reviews.headline: very greasy
reviews.comments: wanted to love but left my skin feeling super heavy and greasy. broke me out badly. sad :/

reviews.headline: Kiehls till I die!! NEW FORMULA!!!
reviews.comments: They literally only added more Chaga mushroom for evening your skin tone and boosting skin radiance! Y'all don't want that? Y'all trippin!!

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: I've noticed a smoother more youthful appearance sense using this. It doesn't clog pores and I love the smell.

reviews.headline: I would not buy this product again
reviews.comments: I bought this because it had good reviews.  I am almost finished with my first jar and I have to say I have not noticed any change in my skin. It did not soften my skin and there was absolutely no softening on my neck even though it is advertised for the face and neck.  I will go back to the $10.00 neck cream that made a big difference. I'm not sure what I was expecting, but for the price I excepted a whole lot better.  However, this brand's foot cream is the best I've used and I will buy that cream again.

media.headline: Jowls of life
media.caption: After the use of the products

faceoff_positive.comments: The fact that a lot of the bad reviews state that this moisturizer makes their face oily made me chuckle, in a sense that most people with oily skin actually age better than the ones with dry skin because they are able to preserve moisture better. The goal of skincare should be to nourish, repair, rebuild and refresh cells, especially the vital protein chains that power them. I was actually shocked to see a product in the market that's first few ingredients didn't contain dimethicone, or worse, glycols. (glycols may have effects including brain, liver and kidney abnormalities.) I was also relieved to know that most of the ingredients I could point out, or at least know what the properties were and why they are in there. So you want to complain that your skin is oily, and your pillow is oily? How about you thank kiehls for not putting terrible things into its products and giving you what a moisturizer is supposed to do! This product is amazing. I love the way my skin glows when I apply it, and my skin is noticably more perfected.
faceoff_positive.headline: If you read only one review, read this.

faceoff_negative.comments: Like many others, I have to report that this stings my face and it feels like it is burning. For years I used Kiehls wrinkle reducing cream. They discontinued this product (PLEASE BRING IT BACK!!). Kiehls suggested I use the super multi-corrective cream as a replacement. Never again. The thing that is strange is that many customers are reporting this same burning/stinging sensation.  Apparently this product used to work, but the new forumula causes stinging for many. Please do not discontinue products that work and please don't change the formula of products as well.
faceoff_negative.headline: OUCH! THIS STINGS!!
